Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Lamp "with Delphiniform handle"
Description: This terracotta lamp belongs to the type called "with Delphiniform handle". It is distinguished by the presence of a tenon in the form of a dolphin. This category of moulded lamps has been produced in different centres from the eastern basin of the Mediterranean lasting the first centuries of our era.
